snippet: Hill held off hard charges by Ben Blankenship and Evan Jager to win the first two-mile run in the USA Indoor Track & Field Championships in 84 years.
abstract: Ryan Hill wins first two-mile run in USA Indoor Track & Field Championships in 84 years at 8 minutes 26.72 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Hill held off hard charges by Ben Blankenship and Evan Jager to win the first two-mile run in the USA Indoor Track & Field Championships in 84 years.

headline.main: Ryan Hill Holds On to Win First Two-Mile Run in 84 Years
headline.print_headline: Hill Holds on to Win First Two-Mile Run in 84 Years
